solution_line_template: Katie runs one-third of Xavier's distance, which is {xavier_miles}/{katie_divisor} miles = <<{xavier_miles}/{katie_divisor}={katie_miles}>>{katie_miles} miles.
Cole runs a quarter of Katie's distance, which translates to {katie_miles}/{cole_divisor} = <<{katie_miles}/{cole_divisor}={cole_miles}>>{cole_miles} miles.
